Package org.apache.iceberg.metrics

Interface MetricsContext.Counter<T extends Number>

Enclosing interface:
MetricsContext
@Deprecated public static interface MetricsContext.Counter<T extends Number>
Deprecated.
will be removed in 2.0.0, use Counter instead.
